text: Hessaththoka Sodomene Gamooray qasseka istta heeran diza katamatika laymatidanne salo medhetethatara laymatanas amottida. Hesa gishshi istti medhina taman xuugistanaytas lemiso gidida. f/ Haysi qofazi eketiday Medhetistaha maxafa 19.5-11 gidishin Sodeme asay Loxxekko, yida immathatara laymatana koydayssa beses.
